A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After watching this movie a second time\, I came the the conclusion that it is actually a very good movie. Now there are a few areas where it faulters (namely the horrible casting of Rose and Vice Admiral Holdo). As someone who read every book I have to say I think they handled the Luke story arc well. If you really think about it\, he had maybe 1 week of training and yet he is supposed to be unshakable in the ways of the Jedi? The end scenes with him where the best parts of the movie and a fitting end. Also please stop making comments about Leia\, they could not rewrite and reshoot a vast majority of the movie after she passed. Looking forward to see how they close this off in 18 months.
